name: qr_code_image
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool variable_size_qr_code_api.
Tool description: This api takes a URL and the desired size of the QR Code and returns the QR Code image.
API description: this end point takes a 'GET' request with url / string and an size / integer as parameters and returns a QR Code image of the desired size.

size.description: The size of the QR code image. Default is 5.

url.description: The URL to be encoded in the QR code. Default is 'www.google.com'.
